attributes.action: Body shaming in schools, social-media and public needs to be a criminal offence!
attributes.additional_details: To many young people are being targeted, mainly on social media, for there body image and it’s wrong to shame other people due to how their body shape.
attributes.background: I know many girls my age struggle with their body image as well as myself, I have struggled with my body image for a very long time and I am slowly become to love my body. People shaming other people’s bodies is wrong and doesn’t help them! I want to help people learn to love their bodies <3

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about young people's body image. But we're not sure exactly what you mean by "Body shaming...needs to be a criminal offence'. For example, we're not exactly what behaviour you'd like to be defined as body-shaming.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what behaviour you'd like to make illegal.
